EmailTemplate.name: 202103_Internal-Comms_Supplier-Conference_Zoom.2.Invite 2
EmailTemplate.subject: Last Chance to Register | Honeywell 2021 Virtual Supplier Summit
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]> Honeywell 2021 Supplier Summit You’re invited to attend the March 15th Virtual Supplier Summit from 11:30 a.m. – 2:00 p.m. (MST). This is your opportunity to learn more from Honeywell Aerospace Executive Leadership about our business forecast and supply base partnership opportunities. The session will also include 2020 supplier awards and Q&A.
You can expect to receive post-event information from your Commodity Manager that will assist in developing an action plan aligned to topics covered in the meeting.
Please register before Monday, March 15th to reserve your space. You will receive additional details to attend the meeting once you are registered. REGISTER TODAY <[[https://honeywell.zoom.us/webinar/register/WN_Ns3Cp1n3Ql6VVZv57AU8_A]]>
